sentences.sContent: Take me for thy bridegroom, for I love thee.
sentences.sContent_eng: Take me for thy bridegroom, for I love thee.
sentences.sCn: 让我作你的新郎吧。 因为我爱你。

sentences.sContent: Many gifts were showered on the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many gifts were showered on the bride and bridegroom.
sentences.sCn: 人们纷纷给新娘和新郎送贺礼。

sentences.sContent: At the wedding party， the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together.
sentences.sContent_eng: At the wedding party， the bride and the bridegroom expressed that they would live in harmony and mutual respect and grow old together.
sentences.sCn: 婚礼上， 新娘和新郎表示要互敬互爱，白头偕老。

remMethod.val: 美丽的新娘(bride)和帅气的新郎(bridegroom)

trans.tranOther: a man at the time he gets married, or just after he is married
